feed.title: Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Last Mountain 08:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: SW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
